summary.span: 使用自訂成員資格提供者來定義 ASP.NET 實作用以提供成員資格服務的合約。

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide membership services using custom membership providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 成員資格可讓您輕鬆地為您的 ASP.NET 應用程式使用許多不同的成員資格提供者。ASP.NET membership is designed to enable you to easily use a number of different membership providers for your ASP.NET applications. 您可以使用隨附於.NET Framework 中，提供成員資格提供者，或者您可以實作自己的提供者。You can use the supplied membership providers that are included with the .NET Framework, or you can implement your own provider. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 的成員資格功能，請參閱[成員資格簡介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100))再繼續進行。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 如需成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用的成員資格管理使用者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 在實作自訂的成員資格提供者時，您必須繼承抽象類別。When implementing a custom membership provider, you are required to inherit the abstract class. 有兩個建立自訂成員資格提供者的主要原因。There are two primary reasons for creating a custom membership provider. - 您要將成員資格資訊儲存在隨附於.NET Framework 中，例如 FoxPro 資料庫、 Oracle 資料庫或其他資料來源的成員資格提供者不支援的資料來源。You need to store membership information in a data source that is not supported by the membership providers included with the .NET Framework, such as a FoxPro database, an Oracle database, or other data source. - 您要管理使用不同於.NET Framework 所隨附的提供者所使用的資料庫結構描述的資料庫結構描述的成員資格資訊。You need to manage membership information using a database schema that is different from the database schema used by the providers that ship with the .NET Framework. 常見的例子，這是公司或網站的 SQL Server 資料庫中已經存在的成員資格資料。A common example of this would be membership data that already exists in a SQL Server database for a company or Web site. 抽象類別繼承自抽象類別。The abstract class inherits from the abstract class. 實作也必須實作的所需的成員。 implementations must also implement the required members of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會儲存在具有特定的應用程式相關聯使用者的相關的使用者資訊的資料來源。The property value is stored in the data source with related user information to associate a user with a particular application. 這個屬性是讀取/寫入，且預設為屬性值，如果未明確指定。This property is read/write and defaults to the property value if not specified explicitly. 由於成員資格提供者儲存獨有的每個應用程式的使用者資訊，多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的資料來源，而不會建立重複的使用者名稱，如果發生衝突。Because membership providers store user information uniquely for each application, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same data source without running into a conflict if duplicate user names are created. 或者，多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的使用者資料來源指定相同。Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user data source by specifying the same . 在 成員資格提供者實作，您必須確認您的資料結構描述中包含和資料來源的查詢和更新也包括。In your membership provider implementation, you will need to ensure that your data schema includes the and that data source queries and updates also include the . ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱 < [ 實作設定檔提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 做為輸入，採用新的使用者、 密碼和電子郵件地址的名稱和資料來源中插入新的使用者，應用程式。Takes, as input, the name of a new user, a password, and an email address and inserts a new user for the application into the data source. 方法會傳回填入新建立的使用者資訊的物件。The method returns a object populated with the information for the newly created user. 方法也會定義`out`參數 (在 Visual Basic 中，您可以使用`ByRef`)，傳回值，指出，使用者已成功建立，或是該使用者建立失敗原因。The method also defines an `out` parameter (in Visual Basic, you can use `ByRef`) that returns a value that indicates that the user was successfully created, or a reason that user creation failed. 方法會引發事件，如果事件處理常式已指定，並繼續或取消建立使用者動作，根據事件的結果。The method raises the event, if a event handler has been specified, and continues or cancels the create-user action based on the results of the event. 您可以使用虛擬方法，執行指定事件處理常式。You can use the virtual method to execute the specified event handler. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱 < [ 實作設定檔提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回成員資格使用者的清單，其中使用者的電子郵件地址符合所提供`emailToMatch`已設定屬性。 returns a list of membership users where the user's email address matches the supplied `emailToMatch` for the configured property. 如果您的資料來源支援的其他搜尋功能，例如萬用字元，您可以提供更豐富的搜尋功能的電子郵件地址。If your data source supports additional search capabilities, such as wildcard characters, you can provide more extensive search capabilities for email addresses. 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的號碼物件中傳回集合。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the number of objects to return in the collection. `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回其中 0 識別的第一頁的結果。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return where 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為 比對的成員資格使用者總數`emailToMatch`值。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users that matched the `emailToMatch` value. 比方說，如果 13 個使用者找不到何處`emailToMatch`比對的一部分或整個電子郵件地址，而`pageIndex`值為 1`pageSize`為 5，則會包含第 6 到傳回的第十個使用者。For example, if 13 users were found where `emailToMatch` matched part of or the entire email address, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, then the would contain the sixth through the tenth users returned. `totalRecords` 會設定為 13。`totalRecords` would be set to 13. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱 < [ 實作設定檔提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

span.span: The number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可搭配防止不必要的來源，猜測密碼或密碼解答的成員資格使用者透過重複嘗試。The property works in conjunction with the property to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 無效的密碼或提供成員資格使用者的密碼問題的數目是否大於或等於屬性值所識別的分鐘數內，然後藉由設定鎖定成員資格使用者屬性，以`true`直到呼叫解除鎖定使用者方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user is greater than or equal to the property value within the number of minutes identified by the , then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果提供有效密碼或密碼解答之前達到值時，會追蹤無效嘗試的計數器會重設為零。If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the value is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is reset to zero. 無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試累積彼此。Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another. 例如，如果屬性設定為 5，，後面接著兩個不正確的密碼解答嘗試進行三個無效的密碼嘗試次數內，則必須進行兩個多個無效的密碼嘗試次數（或多個無效的密碼解答嘗試三）成員資格使用者遭到鎖定。For example, if the property is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within the for the membership user to be locked out. 如果屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. 在中，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試， ， ， ，和方法。Invalid password and password-answer attempts are tracked in the , , , , and methods. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱 < [ 實作設定檔提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可搭配防止不必要的來源，猜測密碼或密碼解答的成員資格使用者透過重複嘗試。The property works in conjunction with the property to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 如果不正確的密碼或提供成員資格使用者的密碼問題數目超過所識別的分鐘數內，然後藉由設定鎖定成員資格使用者屬性`true`直到呼叫解除鎖定使用者方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user exceeds the within the number of minutes identified by the , then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果之前提供有效密碼或密碼解答會達到，追蹤無效嘗試次數的計數器會重設為零。If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is reset to zero. 無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試累積彼此。Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another. 例如，如果屬性設定為 5，，後面接著兩個不正確的密碼解答嘗試進行三個無效的密碼嘗試次數內，則必須進行兩個多個無效的密碼嘗試次數（或多個無效的密碼解答嘗試三）成員資格使用者遭到鎖定的值。For example, if the property is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within the value for the membership user to be locked out. 如果屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. 在中，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試， ， ， ，和方法。Invalid password and password-answer attempts are tracked in the , , , , and methods. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱 < [ 實作設定檔提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示將密碼儲存在成員資格資料存放區中的格式。

value.span: 其中一個 值，這個值表示將密碼儲存在資料存放區中的格式。

span.span: One of the values indicating the format for storing passwords in the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示密碼會儲存在格式。The property indicates the format that passwords are stored in. 使用`Hashed`僅`Clear`和`Encrypted`不安全。Use `Hashed` only, `Clear` and `Encrypted` are not secure. `Hashed` 密碼已雜湊使用單向雜湊演算法和隨機產生的 salt 值儲存在資料庫時。`Hashed` passwords are hashed using a one-way hash algorithm and a randomly generated salt value when stored in the database. 密碼驗證時，它會雜湊驗證的資料庫中的 salt 值。When a password is validated, it is hashed with the salt value in the database for verification. 無法擷取雜湊的密碼。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. `Encrypted` 密碼不視為安全的會顯示您的資料庫內容的入侵也可以公開加密金鑰。`Encrypted` passwords are not considered safe, as a breach that reveals your database contents can also expose the encryption key. 這表示您已加密的密碼無法解密和公開。This means your encrypted passwords could be decrypted and exposed. 您可以使用並的虛擬方法類別來加密和解密的密碼值，或者您可以提供自己的加密程式碼。You can use the and virtual methods of the class to encrypt and decrypt password values, or you can supply your own encryption code. 如果您使用並的虛擬方法類別`Encrypted`使用中所提供的金鑰資訊加密密碼[machineKey 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)在您的組態中的項目。If you use the and virtual methods of the class, `Encrypted` passwords are encrypted using the key information supplied in the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) element in your configuration. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱 < [ 實作設定檔提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得用來評估密碼複雜度的規則運算式物件。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity for the object. 屬性設定在應用程式組態中使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性[項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下列範例所示[項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別，以提供成員資格服務和集`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性驗證的密碼是否符合下列準則的規則運算式：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria: - Is greater than 七個字元。Is greater than seven characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密碼不符合這些準則，成員資格提供者不接受密碼。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受輸入的使用者名稱和密碼解答，並產生新的隨機密碼，為指定的使用者。Takes, as input, a user name and a password answer and generates a new, random password for the specified user. > [!NOTE] > 藉由建立隨機密碼方法不保證傳遞中的規則運算式屬性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 不過，隨機的密碼將會符合所建立的準則和屬性However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties 方法會使用新的密碼值來更新資料來源中的使用者資訊，並傳回新的密碼，做為字串。The method updates the user information in the data source with the new password value and returns the new password as a string. 方便的機制，來產生隨機密碼是方法。A convenient mechanism for generating a random password is the method. 可確保旗標設為`true`之前執行任何動作。 ensures that the flag is set to `true` before performing any action. 如果已`false`、擲回例外狀況。If is `false`, a exception is thrown. 也會檢查值屬性。 also checks the value of the property. 如果已`true`，檢查提供的回應參數，針對資料來源中的預存的密碼解答的值。If is `true`, checks the value of the supplied answer parameter against the stored password answer in the data source. 如果不符，擲回例外狀況。If they do not match, a exception is thrown. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱 < [ 實作設定檔提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

summary.span: 在建立使用者、變更密碼，或是重設密碼時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a user is created, a password is changed, or a password is reset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件引發， ，和方法。The event is raised during the , , and methods. 事件發生之前要求的動作，並可讓使用者繼續或取消要求的動作。The event occurs before the action requested and enables the user to continue or cancel the requested action. 如果會取消動作，使用者可以指定將會擲回例外狀況。If the action is canceled, the user can specify an exception to be thrown. 使用者使用事件處理常式，以指定的處理常式事件。Users use a event handler to specify a handler for the event. 提供者實作人員可以使用虛擬方法，以引發事件。Provider implementers can use the virtual method to raise the event. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱 < [ 實作設定檔提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
